title: Add comments support
description: Allow adding comments to tickets. Comments should be stored as separate lines in tickets.jsonl linked by ticket ID. See docs/overview.md for details.

title: Add labels support
description: Allow associating short text labels with tickets for grouping. Labels should be stored with tickets in the JSONL file.

title: Add ticket dependencies
description: Track blocking relationships between tickets. Include 'blocked-by' and 'created-from' relationship types. Must prevent circular blocking dependencies.

title: Add --json output flag
description: Add a --json flag to all commands for machine-readable output. This enables integration with other agentic tools.

title: Add assignee field
description: Track who is working on each ticket. Simple text field for the assignee name.

title: Add issue type field
description: Categorize tickets by type: bug, feature, task, etc.

title: Add unblocked tickets query
description: Add a way to list tickets that are not blocked by other open tickets. This shows actionable work items. Depends on ticket dependencies feature (TH-9f9dc8).

title: Add --data-dir flag to specify custom .thicket directory
description: Add a global --data-dir flag (or similar) to all commands that allows specifying an alternative .thicket directory location. This enables manual testing without affecting the production ticket data. Example: ./thicket --data-dir /tmp/test-thicket list

title: Add THICKET_DIR environment variable support
description: Support a THICKET_DIR environment variable as an alternative to the --data-dir flag for specifying a custom .thicket directory location. The flag should take precedence over the environment variable. Example: THICKET_DIR=/tmp/test-thicket ./thicket list

title: Switch to alphanumeric identifiers
description: Rather than using hex strings for the random part of ticket ids, we should use all the alphanumeric characters [a-z0-9] to pack more randomness into the same six characters

title: Add interactive mode for humans
description: The add command should have an interactive mode that prompts for the title and other fields for use by humans.

title: Add instructions for making a CLAUDE.md file
description: We need to document how people using thicket should setup their CLAUDE.md file to use thicket. The instructions should be minimal and mostly refer to the quickstart command.

title: Comments not correctly persisted to tickets.jsonl
description: When the comments are persisted from SQLite to tickets.jsonl, the data in the comments is lost. Also should check that dependencies are correctly persisted. Add some tests for round-trips between SQLite and tickets.jsonl

title: Move commands to separate files
description: commands.go is growing to be quite large. We should refactor the code to put each command in its own file.

title: Update documentation for humans to describe the --interactive flag
Update agent documentation to instruct agent to add tickets for follow on work when completing an existing ticket.
description: When adding the --interactive flag, the agent did not update the documentation, which is an oversight. Ideally the agent would update the documentation in the same change as implementing the feature, but if the agent is not going to do that, we can at least have the agent file followup tickets for the remaining work. These tickets should be linked to the current ticket because they were discovered when working on that ticket."

title: Add flag to specify link relationships when adding a ticket
description: We should be able to create blocks and created-from links when adding a ticket (without requiring a followup command).

title: Remove docs/overview.md and any references from the docs
description: This file was created early on in the project and is no longer needed. Before deleting the file, ensure that any information that is still relevant to either users of Thicket or to agents is documented in the appropriate locations.

content: We should update the documentation, including the quickstart command, to recommend using this new command to determine what to work on next.
The command should be called  and should be limited to open tickets and show the tickets in priority order.
Implemented the unblocked command and updated documentation.
Updated AGENTS.md to instruct agents on follow-on work. Also fixed missing documentation for --interactive in README.md as discovered during this task.
